definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
to make green with plants/to reforest/(Internet slang) Islamization
green area (e.g. urban park or garden)
permanent residency permit (originally referred specifically to the US green card)
Green Standard Army, standing infantry during Qing dynasty, originally formed from Ming and other Chinese army units

sentences.english: These red apples are big, but those green ones are small.
sentences.chinese: 这些红苹果大，而那些绿苹果小。
生病的植物往往是退绿的。

sentences.english: The colors in white light are red, orange, yellow, green, blue and violet .
sentences.chinese: 在白光中的颜色有红，橙，黄，绿，蓝和青。

sentences.english: A Hawaiian green sea turtle swims in just a few feet of water.
sentences.chinese: 一只夏威夷绿海龟在几英尺水下游泳。

sentences.english: An impure oxide of cobalt, used to produce a blue color in enamel and in the making of smalt.
sentences.chinese: 浅的绿蓝色颜料，主要由钴和锡的氧化物组成。

sentences.english: The miniature solid state green laser has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制成微型全固态绿激光器。

sentences.english: All that could be seen of him were his green eyes and one white- furred ear.
sentences.chinese: 只能看到两只绿眼睛和一只白绒绒的耳朵。

sentences.english: Dish is the mouth right the red white green arrowhead of next horn what meaning to represent?
sentences.chinese: 盘口右下角的红白绿箭头个代表什么意思？

sentences.english: You will be given a sample of either caraway oil or spearmint oil.
sentences.chinese: 你将会收到一个葛缕子油或绿薄荷油样品。

sentences.english: S. city has at least a half-dozen places where you can find a decent green chicken curry.
sentences.chinese: 今天，任何一个美国大城市能都找到正宗的绿咖喱鸡。

sentences.english: Li gave several more songs to cry, to go after the Spring Green pedestrians.
sentences.chinese: 一声骊歌几声哭，行人去后春江绿。

sentences.english: Off the plane you see waves are green and full of trimming the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 一下飞机，满眼都是绿，到处是修整的草坪。

sentences.english: Outside in daylight, it is a cool bluish mossy green .
sentences.chinese: 白天在外面，这是一个酷蓝蓝苔藓绿。

sentences.english: There was a big garden in the town with green grass in the centre.
sentences.chinese: 镇上有个大公园，中间是绿草地。

sentences.english: An excellent medium pale sstaw colour with lemon green tints .
sentences.chinese: 酒色带有一种极好的中度亮黄色带有柠檬绿的光晕。

definition: abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
brown/gray or dark color/coarse hemp cloth/Taiwan pr. [he2]
